Package services

Class CampDataService

java.lang.Object
services.CampDataService
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataServiceable, Exportable, Importable
public class CampDataService extends Object implements DataServiceable
The CampDataService class provides data import and export services for the camps in the CAMs application. It reads camp data from a file and writes camp data to a file.

The class utilizes DAOs for accessing camp information and employs the DateUtil class for date-related operations.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Chuan Shan Hong, Joelle Chew Ningxi
